Twoâ€‘thirds of the girls are in the Girl Scouts, so \( \frac{2}{3}\times 80 = 53.33\) girls are in the Scouts.  
Hence the number of girls not in the Scouts is \(80-53.33 \approx 26.67\), which rounds to **27** girls. #### 27
